sentences.sContent: Some sedatives produce the paradoxical effect of making the person more anxious.
sentences.sCn: 一些镇静剂产生出使人更紧张这样自相矛盾的结果。

synos.tran: 矛盾的；诡论的；似非而是的

remMethod.val: 来自paradox (似非而是的说法) + ical → 似非而是的

words.tran: 自相矛盾地；似非而是地；反常地
悖论，反论；似非而是的论点；自相矛盾的人或事

trans.tranCn: 似非而是的； 自相矛盾的
trans.tranOther: If something is paradoxical, it involves two facts or qualities that seem to contradict each other
